Class Piece

    • checkers.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    ATTENTION BEN!!!! I needed to change the images from BufferedImages to ImageIcons so that they could be sent over the network - Would it be possible to remove all BufferedImages stuff and only deal with imageIcon objects?
